document.full_text: yemen's president ali abdullah saleh will leave office after organizing congress elections by january 2012, refusing to hand over power without knowing who would succeed him, an aide said on tuesday.
document.title: yemen's saleh to step down by jan 2012 after polls
lines_and_colors: yemen's president ali abdullah saleh will leave office after organizing congress elections by january 2012, refusing to hand over power without knowing who would succeed him, an aide said on tuesday.
